name: SpaceCraft (itch) (Luan Ramos)
description:
Hi everyone, It's Luan here. Welcome and rejoice with me in the amazing universe of game develoment. This is my first game SpaceCraft. I hope you like it! 

-  SpaceCraft is an endless runner space-themed mobile game.

-  Avoid all the obstacles while collecting fuel for your spaceship.

-  Choose how to control your spaceship, whether by joystick or Accelerometer Sensor that is by the inclination of your mobile device .

Instagram page: @planetaryofc
